about_the_game:
In "Exelio," players must adapt to an ever-changing environment and face various threats while acquiring the knowledge and skills necessary to survive in uncharted lands. At times, you'll need to engage in combat with unknown creatures. As you explore a world where beautiful nature and harsh realities collide, you'll uncover the mysteries of the world and forge your own destiny. The game offers a variety of elements for players to enjoy:

Exploration:
Explore diverse terrains such as mountains, snowfields, jungles, caves, and ruins, where you'll encounter challenges that require a wide range of actions.

Survival:
Securing food and water is always crucial. Efficiently and effectively gathering resources is key to staying alive as you progress through the game.

Crafting:
Collect materials from various locations to create essential tools, weapons, buildings, food, and plants. With countless combinations, you can build your own base to ensure survival.

Combat:
In addition to fighting wild animals during the day, eerie shadows creep in at night. Find the best strategies to confront the numerous enemies you'll face.

Story:
The story unfolds as you uncover the mysteries surrounding two protagonists. Why have they appeared in this place? Mastering the unique characteristics of each protagonist is crucial to advancing the game.

name: EXELIO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i5-3570K 3.4 GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i9-9900K 3.6 GHz 8 Core
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: In "Exelio," you'll face an ever-changing environment and various threats while acquiring the knowledge and skills needed to survive in uncharted lands. Explore a world where beautiful nature and harsh realities collide, and delve into its mysteries as you carve out your own fate.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
